about.name: Jeremy Gilliam
description: Jeremy Gilliam is a Professional Engineer at WestWater Engineering.  Jeremy holds a Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Mechanical Engineering from Colorado Mesa University that he attained while working his way through school and supporting his family.

Jeremy began his career with WestWater Engineering 15 years ago as a CAD technician utilizing his knowledge of AutoCAD Civil 3D design software.  During his first ten years at WestWater Engineering as the lead CAD technician, he continued to expand his experience with design software while taking every opportunity to learn all the facets of the engineering discipline.

Over the past five years, Jeremy has transitioned to the lead design engineer for numerous projects.  Projects Jeremy has completed as lead design engineer include wastewater treatment plant improvements, sewer line replacements, lift station upgrade/replacement designs, river restoration projects, and water treatment and distribution system designs.

Jeremy does enjoy solving intricate water problems; however, he also thoroughly enjoys the challenges of construction oversight.  Jeremy believes in the engineering process and understands the value of providing the most feasible and economical solution for each project.
